Document.name: EditHyperlink
Document.summary: Set hyperlink in a specified range.
Document.param: The index of the paragraph to edit.
The begin position of the range.
The end position of the range.
The normal style name of the hyperlink.
The active style name of the hyperlink.
Document.signature: void EditHyperlink( vint paragraphIndex, vint begin, vint end, WString const & reference, WString const & normalStyleName /* optional */, WString const & activeStyleName /* optional */ );
